meta.name: dc:Publisher
meta.content: Watch Tower Bible and Tract Society of Pennsylvania

p.span: Praise Jah! Praise God in his holy place. Praise him in the expanse of his strength.
2 Praise him for his mighty works. Praise him for his exceeding greatness.
3 Praise him with the sounding of the horn. Praise him with the stringed instrument and the harp.
4 Praise him with the tambourine and the circle dance. Praise him with strings and the flute.
5 Praise him with ringing cymbals. Praise him with crashing cymbals.
6 Every breathing thing—let it praise Jah. Praise Jah!
